articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: Evernote has laid off most of its US staff and will move most operations to Europe - The Verge
articles.description: Evernote parent company Bending Spoons said its layoff of most of its Chilean and US staff and shift to Europe would boost efficiency and take advantage of the Bending Spoons brand.
articles.content:
Evernote has laid off most of its US staff and will move most operations to Europe
